attributes.action: Hold a general election as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details: Debate on this matter and hold a parliament wide vote on the motion
attributes.background: Call for a general election as soon as possible. The current government do not have the same mandate as the government elected in 2019. There were put in power by a slim percentage of the UK population and must be replaced before they do irreparable damage to the UK economy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
